snippet: England has a long history of betting on unlikely events; bookmakers can give you odds on, say, whether your daughter will reach the Olympics.
lead_paragraph: England has a long history of betting on unlikely events; bookmakers can give you odds on, say, whether your daughter will reach the Olympics.

headline.seo: In England, Gambling on Children’s Olympic Prospects
headline.main: Raising a Future Olympian? What Are the Odds?
headline.print_headline: Raising a Future Olympian? What Are the Odds?
